alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:59AM EDT until June 12 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 759 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Bonifay to 7 miles west of Vernon to 12 miles east of Eglin Air Force Base, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Live Oak, Wausau, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Seminole Hills, Singer Road, Camp Flowers, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Porter Lake, Knox Hill, Vicksburg, Smyrna, Sylvania, Bayhead and West Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
